ingredients: 6 large baking apples, peeled, cored, and chopped
1 (64 fluid ounce) bottle Cranberry Apple Flavor LIBBY'S® JUICY JUICE® 100% Juice
title: Homemade Cranberry Applesauce
instructions: COMBINE apples, Juicy Juice, cranberries, brown sugar and cinnamon in stockpot. Cook over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, for 35 to 40 minutes or until apples are very tender. Serve warm or chilled.
